column4: so I got this FUJI camera, ID 04cb:0246 Fuji Photo Film Co., Ltd   won't automount anymore, usually automounts to 'usb-ptp//'
i went to take photos off of it yesterday and it worked the first time, then i unplugged it, took more photos, then went to take more off and .... wouldn't automount ... wouldn't mount period
what does syslog have to say
